column5: Hello fellow fishers,  I'm looking ahead to a spring ice-out lake trout trip, and am hoping some of you might share your wisdom on where (approximately) you might recommned I go, and what time of year might be best? . .  Somehwere 4 hrs or less from T.O preferred.  I'll be trailering up my boat . .  I'm a newbie to this forum - any feedback appreciated!!   Can't wait until spring . .
Where? one of these lakes...  Ontario lake trout lakes  When? call local tackle shops to get an idea of ice out this spring typically mid april to early may
Right now, Id settle fer an Ice In Laker.
you could try the Niagara bar at the mouth of the niagara river.....tons of lakers there I here, even right now I think they are there most of the winter.
